A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Being a big Star Wars fan myself\, I must admit I absolutely enjoyed the movie. Aside from the amazing visual and exotic locations\, I also like the movie's narrative and theme about Failure and Redemption\, which is carried out pretty consistently throughout the film. Although I did have some minor issues with it\, which mostly stemmed from my own expectations\, this action-packed and characters-focused movie is entertaining through and through. Hence my rating of 5/5.
